title: CHRISTIAN, Ellen Jun 10, 1929 - Dec 26, 2023
text:
Ellen A. Christian, 94, of Ft. Meyers, FL., formerly of Ashland, passed away Tuesday, December 26, 2023, at the Cedar Ridge Health Campus in Cynthiana, KY, surrounded by her loving family.
She was born June 10, 1929, in Aldine, TX; the daughter of the late Walter Leroy and Ellen Gordon Phillips.
Ellen was a member of the 18th Hole Ladies Golf Association at the Bellefonte Country Club where she also loved to play bridge, a member of The Landings Ladies Golf Association in Ft. Myers, FL, active with Meals on Wheels, and a member of the First United Methodist Church.
In addition to her parents, her husband, Mack A. Christian, Jr., and eight siblings also preceded her in death.
Survivors include two sons, Dr. Michael Christian and his wife Janice of Ashland and Paul Wayne Christian and his wife Eva of Ft. Myers, FL; one daughter, Catherine Ann McCord and her husband Dr. Gary McCord; four grandchildren, Alexandra Christian, Matthew McCord and his wife Dr. Aishah Ali, Mark McCord and his wife Mary Margaret and Allison Christian; two great-grandchildren, Reynolds McCord, and Mary Elam McCord.
The family would like to invite everyone to a celebration of life service for Ellen, noon Saturday, December 30, 2023, at the Gravesite at Rose Hill Burial Park. Services will be officiated by Dr. Larry Bishop.
In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to Friends of the Children, P.O. Box 1123, Ashland, KY 41105-1123.
STEEN FUNERAL HOME 13th STREET CHAPEL has been entrusted with services.
To share a memory or condolence of Ellen please visit; www.steenfuneralhome.com

Plant a tree: How does it work
When your purchase is complete, a post will be made on the tribute wall of the deceased signifying the planting of a memorial tree.
An official certificate recognizing your purchase will be included with your email receipt. You can then forward the email to the family or print it and give it to them personally.
After an order is placed, our forestry partners will plant the tree in the area of greatest need (nearest the funeral home), according to the planting schedule for the year.
Due to seasonal conditions, the tree planting takes place during the spring and summer.
Tree Planting Timeline
Orders placed in:
January - May
Planting will take place in Spring or Summer of the same year.
June - December
Planting will take place in Spring of the following year.
